title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer for Ollama models, exposing chat, generate and embed interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, models, RAG, admin) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying, fine-tuning and benchmarking Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local LLM assistance using Ollama inside your vault.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node enabling no-code workflows with Ollama models (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks for Ollama with Open-WebUI, RAG, and GPU profiles.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that combines Ollama with Chroma DB for private RAG.

title: ollama-keras
summary: Keras / TensorFlow addon that delegates text generation to local Ollama endpoints for quick experimentation.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama inside CI pipelines for testing AI-powered features.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Subreddit for Ollama users to share models, troubleshooting tips and integrations.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama v0.1.32 release highlighting new tool-use beta and performance gains.
